overview.description: CrypGPT combines Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to deliver practical, real-world utilities that enhance trading, security, payments, and global adoption.

use_cases.name: AI Chatbot
use_cases.description: 24/7 AI-powered chatbot handling crypto-related queries and general assistance including blockchain trends, market insights, and daily problem-solving.

use_cases.name: AI Crypto Portfolio Management
use_cases.description: AI-driven portfolio manager consolidating multiple wallets and exchanges, tracking performance and suggesting personalized strategies for ROI and risk management.

use_cases.name: AI Trading Signal Assistant + Automated Bots
use_cases.description: Real-time AI trading signals with automated execution bots across DeFi and centralized exchanges, including built-in risk control mechanisms.

use_cases.name: Crypto Card
use_cases.description: Global crypto-fiat payment card enabling seamless spending of digital assets with AI-driven conversion routing.

use_cases.name: Telegram AI Bot
use_cases.description: Telegram-integrated AI bot for instant community engagement, automated support, and user empowerment.

use_cases.name: Multi-Language Global Chatbot
use_cases.description: AI chatbot supporting 100+ languages to eliminate language barriers and enable global participation.

use_cases.name: Move-to-Earn & Chat-to-Earn
use_cases.description: Earning models rewarding user activity through health-based move-to-earn initiatives and community-driven chat-to-earn systems.

use_cases.name: AI Scam & Fraud Detection
use_cases.description: AI algorithms detecting scams, phishing links, fake contracts, and rug pulls to safeguard investors.

use_cases.name: AI Identity & KYC Verification
use_cases.description: AI-powered identity verification and fraud prevention for exchanges, dApps, and DeFi platforms.

use_cases.name: Decentralized Knowledge Hub
use_cases.description: Blockchain-verified knowledge hub where AI curates and fact-checks crypto data to eliminate misinformation.

conclusion: CrypGPT bridges AI and Blockchain to create a secure, intelligent, and globally accessible ecosystem solving real-world crypto challenges.
